00015 using Luthetus.Common.Tests.Basis.TreeViews.Models.Internals; 00016 00017 namespace Luthetus.Common.Tests.Basis.TreeViews.Models; 00018 00022 public class TreeViewKeyboardEventHandlerTests 00023 { 00027 [Fact] 00028 public void Constructor() 00029 { 00030 InitializeTreeViewKeyboardEventHandlerTests( 00031 out var dispatcher, 00032 out var commonTreeViews, 00033 out var commonComponentRenderers, 00034 out var treeViewStateWrap, 00035 out var treeViewService, 00036 out var backgroundTaskService, 00037 out var websiteServerState, 00038 out var websiteServer, 00039 out var websiteServerTreeView, 00040 out var websiteServerTreeViewContainer, 00041 out var keyboardEventHandler); 00042 00043 Assert.NotNull(keyboardEventHandler); 00044 } 00045 00049 [Fact] 00050 public async Task OnKeyDown_MoveLeft() 00051 { 00052 InitializeTreeViewKeyboardEventHandlerTests( 00053 out var dispatcher, 00054 out var commonTreeViews, 00055 out var commonComponentRenderers, 00056 out var treeViewStateWrap, 00057 out var treeViewService, 00058 out var backgroundTaskService, 00059 out var websiteServerState, 00060 out var websiteServer, 00061 out var websiteServerTreeView, 00062 out var websiteServerTreeViewContainer, 00063 out var keyboardEventHandler); 00064 00065 Assert.Equal(websiteServerTreeViewContainer.ActiveNode, websiteServerTreeView); 00066 00067 // Test Setup 00068 { 00069 // The 'InitializeTreeViewKeyboardEventHandlerTests' method provides an unexpanded 00070 // node. Therefore, make the node expanded. 00071 await keyboardEventHandler.OnKeyDownAsync(new TreeViewCommandArgs( 00072 treeViewService, 00073 websiteServerTreeViewContainer, 00074 websiteServerTreeView, 00075 () => Task.CompletedTask, 00076 null, 00077 null, 00078 new KeyboardEventArgs 00079 { 00080 Key = KeyboardKeyFacts.MovementKeys.ARROW_RIGHT, 00081 Code = KeyboardKeyFacts.MovementKeys.ARROW_RIGHT, 00082 })); 00083 00084 // Set active node to root's first child 00085 await keyboardEventHandler.OnKeyDownAsync(new TreeViewCommandArgs( 00086 treeViewService, 00087 websiteServerTreeViewContainer, 00088 websiteServerTreeView, 00089 () => Task.CompletedTask, 00090 null, 00091 null, 00092 new KeyboardEventArgs 00093 { 00094 Key = KeyboardKeyFacts.MovementKeys.ARROW_RIGHT, 00095 Code = KeyboardKeyFacts.MovementKeys.ARROW_RIGHT, 00096 })); 00097 } 00098 00099 Assert.True(treeViewService.TryGetTreeViewContainer( 00100 websiteServerTreeViewContainer.Key, 00101 out websiteServerTreeViewContainer!)); 00102 00103 Assert.Equal(websiteServerTreeView.ChildList.First(), websiteServerTreeViewContainer.ActiveNode); 00104 00105 // Move to parent of active node. (this results in root being the active node) 00106 await keyboardEventHandler.OnKeyDownAsync(new TreeViewCommandArgs( 00107 treeViewService, 00108 websiteServerTreeViewContainer, 00109 websiteServerTreeView, 00110 () => Task.CompletedTask, 00111 null, 00112 null, 00113 new KeyboardEventArgs 00114 { 00115 Key = KeyboardKeyFacts.MovementKeys.ARROW_LEFT, 00116 Code = KeyboardKeyFacts.MovementKeys.ARROW_LEFT, 00117 })); 00118 00119 Assert.True(treeViewService.TryGetTreeViewContainer( 00120 websiteServerTreeViewContainer.Key, 00121 out websiteServerTreeViewContainer!)); 00122 00123 Assert.Equal(websiteServerTreeView, websiteServerTreeViewContainer.ActiveNode); 00124 Assert.True(websiteServerTreeView.IsExpanded); 00125 00126 // Collapse the root node 00127 await keyboardEventHandler.OnKeyDownAsync(new TreeViewCommandArgs( 00128 treeViewService, 00129 websiteServerTreeViewContainer, 00130 websiteServerTreeView, 00131 () => Task.CompletedTask, 00132 null, 00133 null, 00134 new KeyboardEventArgs 00135 { 00136 Key = KeyboardKeyFacts.MovementKeys.ARROW_LEFT, 00137 Code = KeyboardKeyFacts.MovementKeys.ARROW_LEFT, 00138 })); 00139 00140 Assert.False(websiteServerTreeView.IsExpanded); 00141 } 00142 00146 [Fact] 00147 public async Task OnKeyDown_MoveDown() 00148 { 00149 InitializeTreeViewKeyboardEventHandlerTests( 00150 out var dispatcher, 00151 out var commonTreeViews, 00152 out var commonComponentRenderers, 00153 out var treeViewStateWrap, 00154 out var treeViewService, 00155 out var backgroundTaskService, 00156 out var websiteServerState, 00157 out var websiteServer, 00158 out var websiteServerTreeView, 00159 out var websiteServerTreeViewContainer, 00160 out var keyboardEventHandler); 00161 00162 // Test Setup 00163 { 00164 // The 'InitializeTreeViewKeyboardEventHandlerTests' method provides an unexpanded 00165 // node. Therefore, make the node expanded. 00166 await keyboardEventHandler.OnKeyDownAsync(new TreeViewCommandArgs( 00167 treeViewService, 00168 websiteServerTreeViewContainer, 00169 websiteServerTreeView, 00170 () => Task.CompletedTask, 00171 null, 00172 null, 00173 new KeyboardEventArgs 00174 { 00175 Key = KeyboardKeyFacts.MovementKeys.ARROW_RIGHT, 00176 Code = KeyboardKeyFacts.MovementKeys.ARROW_RIGHT, 00177 })); 00178 } 00179 00180 Assert.Equal(websiteServerTreeView, websiteServerTreeViewContainer.ActiveNode); 00181 00182 await keyboardEventHandler.OnKeyDownAsync(new TreeViewCommandArgs( 00183 treeViewService, 00184 websiteServerTreeViewContainer, 00185 websiteServerTreeView, 00186 () => Task.CompletedTask, 00187 null, 00188 null, 00189 new KeyboardEventArgs 00190 { 00191 Key = KeyboardKeyFacts.MovementKeys.ARROW_DOWN, 00192 Code = KeyboardKeyFacts.MovementKeys.ARROW_DOWN, 00193 })); 00194 00195 Assert.True(treeViewService.TryGetTreeViewContainer( 00196 websiteServerTreeViewContainer.Key, 00197 out websiteServerTreeViewContainer)); 00198 00199 Assert.NotNull(websiteServerTreeViewContainer); 00200 Assert.Equal(websiteServerTreeView.ChildList.First(), websiteServerTreeViewContainer!.ActiveNode); 00201 } 00202 00206 [Fact] 00207 public async Task OnKeyDown_MoveUp() 00208 { 00209 InitializeTreeViewKeyboardEventHandlerTests( 00210 out var dispatcher, 00211 out var commonTreeViews, 00212 out var commonComponentRenderers, 00213 out var treeViewStateWrap, 00214 out var treeViewService, 00215 out var backgroundTaskService, 00216 out var websiteServerState, 00217 out var websiteServer, 00218 out var websiteServerTreeView, 00219 out var websiteServerTreeViewContainer, 00220 out var keyboardEventHandler); 00221 00222 // Test Setup 00223 { 00224 // The 'InitializeTreeViewKeyboardEventHandlerTests' method provides an unexpanded 00225 // node. Therefore, make the node expanded. 00226 await keyboardEventHandler.OnKeyDownAsync(new TreeViewCommandArgs( 00227 treeViewService, 00228 websiteServerTreeViewContainer, 00229 websiteServerTreeView, 00230 () => Task.CompletedTask, 00231 null, 00232 null, 00233 new KeyboardEventArgs 00234 { 00235 Key = KeyboardKeyFacts.MovementKeys.ARROW_RIGHT, 00236 Code = KeyboardKeyFacts.MovementKeys.ARROW_RIGHT, 00237 })); 00238 00239 // Change the active node to the root node's first child. 00240 await keyboardEventHandler.OnKeyDownAsync(new TreeViewCommandArgs( 00241 treeViewService, 00242 websiteServerTreeViewContainer, 00243 websiteServerTreeView, 00244 () => Task.CompletedTask, 00245 null, 00246 null, 00247 new KeyboardEventArgs 00248 { 00249 Key = KeyboardKeyFacts.MovementKeys.ARROW_RIGHT, 00250 Code = KeyboardKeyFacts.MovementKeys.ARROW_RIGHT, 00251 })); 00252 00253 Assert.True(treeViewService.TryGetTreeViewContainer( 00254 websiteServerTreeViewContainer.Key, 00255 out websiteServerTreeViewContainer)); 00256 } 00257 00258 Assert.Equal(websiteServerTreeView.ChildList.First(), websiteServerTreeViewContainer!.ActiveNode); 00259 00260 await keyboardEventHandler.OnKeyDownAsync(new TreeViewCommandArgs( 00261 treeViewService, 00262 websiteServerTreeViewContainer, 00263 websiteServerTreeView, 00264 () => Task.CompletedTask, 00265 null, 00266 null, 00267 new KeyboardEventArgs 00268 { 00269 Key = KeyboardKeyFacts.MovementKeys.ARROW_UP, 00270 Code = KeyboardKeyFacts.MovementKeys.ARROW_UP, 00271 })); 00272 00273 Assert.True(treeViewService.TryGetTreeViewContainer( 00274 websiteServerTreeViewContainer.Key, 00275 out websiteServerTreeViewContainer)); 00276 00277 Assert.NotNull(websiteServerTreeViewContainer); 00278 Assert.Equal(websiteServerTreeView, websiteServerTreeViewContainer!.ActiveNode); 00279 00280 // TODO: Add testing for more complex cases 00281 } 00282 00286 [Fact] 00287 public async Task OnKeyDown_MoveRight_NOT_IsExpandedAsync() 00288 { 00289 InitializeTreeViewKeyboardEventHandlerTests( 00290 out var dispatcher, 00291 out var commonTreeViews, 00292 out var commonComponentRenderers, 00293 out var treeViewStateWrap, 00294 out var treeViewService, 00295 out var backgroundTaskService, 00296 out var websiteServerState, 00297 out var websiteServer, 00298 out var websiteServerTreeView, 00299 out var websiteServerTreeViewContainer, 00300 out var keyboardEventHandler); 00301 00302 Assert.Equal(websiteServerTreeViewContainer.ActiveNode, websiteServerTreeView); 00303 Assert.Empty(websiteServerTreeView.ChildList); 00304 Assert.True(websiteServerTreeView.IsExpandable); 00305 Assert.False(websiteServerTreeView.IsExpanded); 00306 00307 await keyboardEventHandler.OnKeyDownAsync(new TreeViewCommandArgs( 00308 treeViewService, 00309 websiteServerTreeViewContainer, 00310 websiteServerTreeView, 00311 () => Task.CompletedTask, 00312 null, 00313 null, 00314 new KeyboardEventArgs 00315 { 00316 Key = KeyboardKeyFacts.MovementKeys.ARROW_RIGHT, 00317 Code = KeyboardKeyFacts.MovementKeys.ARROW_RIGHT, 00318 })); 00319 00320 Assert.Single(websiteServerTreeView.ChildList); 00321 Assert.Equal(websiteServerTreeViewContainer.ActiveNode, websiteServerTreeView); 00322 } 00323 00327 [Fact] 00328 public async Task OnKeyDown_MoveRight_IsExpandedAsync() 00329 { 00330 InitializeTreeViewKeyboardEventHandlerTests( 00331 out var dispatcher, 00332 out var commonTreeViews, 00333 out var commonComponentRenderers, 00334 out var treeViewStateWrap, 00335 out var treeViewService, 00336 out var backgroundTaskService, 00337 out var websiteServerState, 00338 out var websiteServer, 00339 out var websiteServerTreeView, 00340 out var websiteServerTreeViewContainer, 00341 out var keyboardEventHandler); 00342 00343 // Test Setup 00344 { 00345 // The 'InitializeTreeViewKeyboardEventHandlerTests' method provides an unexpanded 00346 // node. Therefore, make the node expanded. 00347 await keyboardEventHandler.OnKeyDownAsync(new TreeViewCommandArgs( 00348 treeViewService, 00349 websiteServerTreeViewContainer, 00350 websiteServerTreeView, 00351 () => Task.CompletedTask, 00352 null, 00353 null, 00354 new KeyboardEventArgs 00355 { 00356 Key = KeyboardKeyFacts.MovementKeys.ARROW_RIGHT, 00357 Code = KeyboardKeyFacts.MovementKeys.ARROW_RIGHT, 00358 })); 00359 } 00360 00361 Assert.Equal(websiteServerTreeView, websiteServerTreeViewContainer.ActiveNode); 00362 00363 // MoveRight for the test itself 00364 await keyboardEventHandler.OnKeyDownAsync(new TreeViewCommandArgs( 00365 treeViewService, 00366 websiteServerTreeViewContainer, 00367 websiteServerTreeView, 00368 () => Task.CompletedTask, 00369 null, 00370 null, 00371 new KeyboardEventArgs 00372 { 00373 Key = KeyboardKeyFacts.MovementKeys.ARROW_RIGHT, 00374 Code = KeyboardKeyFacts.MovementKeys.ARROW_RIGHT, 00375 })); 00376 00377 Assert.True(treeViewService.TryGetTreeViewContainer( 00378 websiteServerTreeViewContainer.Key, 00379 out websiteServerTreeViewContainer)); 00380 00381 Assert.NotNull(websiteServerTreeViewContainer); 00382 Assert.Equal(websiteServerTreeView.ChildList.First(), websiteServerTreeViewContainer!.ActiveNode); 00383 } 00384 00388 [Fact] 00389 public async Task OnKeyDown_MoveHomeAsync() 00390 { 00391 InitializeTreeViewKeyboardEventHandlerTests( 00392 out var dispatcher, 00393 out var commonTreeViews, 00394 out var commonComponentRenderers, 00395 out var treeViewStateWrap, 00396 out var treeViewService, 00397 out var backgroundTaskService, 00398 out var websiteServerState, 00399 out var websiteServer, 00400 out var websiteServerTreeView, 00401 out var websiteServerTreeViewContainer, 00402 out var keyboardEventHandler); 00403 00404 // Test Setup 00405 { 00406 // The 'InitializeTreeViewKeyboardEventHandlerTests' method provides an unexpanded 00407 // node. 00460 Assert.Equal(websiteServerTreeView, websiteServerTreeViewContainer!.ActiveNode); 00461 00462 // TODO: Add testing for more complex cases 00463 } 00464 00468 [Fact] 00469 public async Task OnKeyDown_MoveEndAsync() 00470 { 00471 InitializeTreeViewKeyboardEventHandlerTests( 00472 out var dispatcher, 00473 out var commonTreeViews, 00474 out var commonComponentRenderers, 00475 out var treeViewStateWrap, 00476 out var treeViewService, 00477 out var backgroundTaskService, 00478 out var websiteServerState, 00479 out var websiteServer, 00480 out var websiteServerTreeView, 00481 out var websiteServerTreeViewContainer, 00482 out var keyboardEventHandler); Therefore, make the node expanded. 00488 await keyboardEventHandler.OnKeyDownAsync(new TreeViewCommandArgs( 00489 treeViewService, 00490 websiteServerTreeViewContainer, 00491 websiteServerTreeView, 00492 () => Task.CompletedTask, 00493 null, 00494 null, 00495 new KeyboardEventArgs 00496 { 00497 Key = KeyboardKeyFacts.MovementKeys.ARROW_RIGHT, 00498 Code = KeyboardKeyFacts.MovementKeys.ARROW_RIGHT, 00499 })); 00500 } 00501 00502 Assert.Equal(websiteServerTreeView, websiteServerTreeViewContainer.ActiveNode); 00503 00504 // Move from root node to the only child 00505 await keyboardEventHandler.OnKeyDownAsync(new TreeViewCommandArgs( 00506 treeViewService, 00507 websiteServerTreeViewContainer, 00508 websiteServerTreeView, 00509 () => Task.CompletedTask, 00510 null, 00511 null, 00512 new KeyboardEventArgs 00513 { 00514 Key = KeyboardKeyFacts.MovementKeys.END, 00515 Code = KeyboardKeyFacts.MovementKeys.END, 00516 })); 00533 } 00534 00535 private void InitializeTreeViewKeyboardEventHandlerTests( 00536 out IDispatcher dispatcher, 00537 out CommonTreeViews commonTreeViews, 00538 out CommonComponentRenderers commonComponentRenderers, 00539 out IState<TreeViewState> treeViewStateWrap, 00540 out ITreeViewService treeViewService, 00541 out IBackgroundTaskService backgroundTaskService, 00542 out WebsiteServerState websiteServerState, 00543 out WebsiteServer websiteServer, 00544 out WebsiteServerTreeView websiteServerTreeView, 00545 out TreeViewContainer websiteServerTreeViewContainer, 00546 out TreeViewKeyboardEventHandler keyboardEventHandler) 00547 { 00548 var temporaryBackgroundTaskService = backgroundTaskService = new BackgroundTaskServiceSynchronous(); 00549 00550 var continuousQueue = new BackgroundTaskQueue( 00551 ContinuousBackgroundTaskWorker.GetQueueKey(), 00552 ContinuousBackgroundTaskWorker.QUEUE_DISPLAY_NAME); 00553 00554 backgroundTaskService.RegisterQueue(continuousQueue); 00555 00556 var blockingQueue = new BackgroundTaskQueue( 00557 BlockingBackgroundTaskWorker.GetQueueKey(), 00558 BlockingBackgroundTaskWorker.QUEUE_DISPLAY_NAME); 00559 00560 backgroundTaskService.RegisterQueue(blockingQueue); 00561 00562 var services = new ServiceCollection() 00563 .AddScoped<ITreeViewService, TreeViewService>() 00564 .AddScoped(sp => temporaryBackgroundTaskService) 00565 .AddFluxor(options => options.ScanAssemblies(typeof(TreeViewState).Assembly)); 00566 00567 var serviceProvider = services.BuildServiceProvider(); 00568 00569 var store = serviceProvider.GetRequiredService<IStore>(); 00570 store.InitializeAsync().Wait(); 00571 00572 treeViewStateWrap = serviceProvider.GetRequiredService<IState<TreeViewState>>(); 00573 treeViewService = serviceProvider.GetRequiredService<ITreeViewService>(); 00574 backgroundTaskService = serviceProvider.GetRequiredService<IBackgroundTaskService>(); 00575 dispatcher = serviceProvider.GetRequiredService<IDispatcher>(); 00576 00577 commonTreeViews = new CommonTreeViews( 00578 typeof(TreeViewExceptionDisplay), 00579 typeof(TreeViewMissingRendererFallbackDisplay), 00580 typeof(TreeViewTextDisplay), 00581 typeof(TreeViewReflectionDisplay), 00582 typeof(TreeViewPropertiesDisplay), 00583 typeof(TreeViewInterfaceImplementationDisplay), 00584 typeof(TreeViewFieldsDisplay), 00585 typeof(TreeViewExceptionDisplay), 00586 typeof(TreeViewEnumerableDisplay)); 00587 00588 commonComponentRenderers = new CommonComponentRenderers( 00589 typeof(CommonErrorNotificationDisplay), 00590 typeof(CommonInformativeNotificationDisplay), 00591 typeof(CommonProgressNotificationDisplay), 00592 commonTreeViews); 00593 00594 websiteServerState = new WebsiteServerState(); 00595 00596 websiteServer = new WebsiteServer( 00597 "TestServer", 00598 new[] 00599 { 00600 "/", 00601 "/index/", 00602 "/counter/", 00603 "/fetchdata/", 00604 }, 00605 websiteServerState); 00606 00607 websiteServerTreeView = new WebsiteServerTreeView( 00608 websiteServer, 00609 true, 00610 false); 00611 00612 websiteServerTreeViewContainer = new TreeViewContainer( 00613 Key<TreeViewContainer>.NewKey(), 00614 websiteServerTreeView, 00615 new TreeViewNoType[] { websiteServerTreeView }.ToImmutableList()); 00616 00617 treeViewService.RegisterTreeViewContainer(websiteServerTreeViewContainer); 00618 00619 keyboardEventHandler = new TreeViewKeyboardEventHandler( 00620 treeViewService, 00621 backgroundTaskService); 00622 } 00623 }
